## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r echo=TRUE}
activity <- read.csv("activity.csv")
```


## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r echo=TRUE}
totalstep <- as.data.frame(xtabs(steps ~ date,activity))
hist(totalstep$Freq)
mean(totalstep$Freq)
median(totalstep$Freq)
```
